attributes.action: include the option to vote 'None Of The Above' on all UK Ballot papers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Government acknowledges that the UK voting system needs to be overhauled, we want the option to be able to vote for 'None Of The Above' on all UK ballot papers. We want 'None Of The Above' as an alternative to all political parties and as our right to a legitimate protest vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
